nodes.text: Pharshol was a male Dark Lord of the Sith who died and was buried within the Dark Temple on Dromund Kaas centuries ago. In life, he oversaw the construction of the Dark Temple. During the Cold War, his spirit was disturbed and settled within a Twi'lek workman. Gaining complete control over his host body, Pharshol was unaware of any time passing between his death and the current period but retained all the abilities and memories of his previous life. Upon awakening within the workman, he immediately set about trying to recover his apprentice, Anyarah from the Dark Path, which he was convinced she had joined.
